title: Semantik Architect – Generic Event Frame
description: JSON schema for the generic Event frame (`event.generic`), representing a single episode in time with participants, time, location, and additional properties.

frame_type.description: Canonical frame type for this frame family. Must be "event.generic".

id.description: Stable identifier for the event, if available (e.g. Wikidata QID, local ID).

participants.description: Mapping from role label (e.g. "subject", "object", "agent", "beneficiary") to an Entity-shaped object.

time.description: Optional time span describing when the event occurred.

location.description: Optional location where the event took place.

properties.description: Arbitrary additional semantic properties (e.g. instrument, manner, tense/aspect), encoded as a JSON object.

extra.description: Opaque metadata from upstream sources (original JSON, provenance, IDs); not interpreted by the core NLG pipeline.

id.description: Stable identifier for the entity, if any (e.g. Wikidata QID or local ID).

name.description: Preferred surface name for the entity.

human.description: True if the entity is a human person.

entity_type.description: Coarse type label for the entity (e.g. "person", "organization", "city", "ship").

lemmas.description: List of lemma-like keys associated with the entity, for lexicon lookup.

features.description: Arbitrary feature map for language-independent attributes (e.g. grammatical gender, number, animacy).

extra.description: Opaque metadata for original source representation, IDs, etc.

Location.description: Location entity, matching semantics.types.Location (cities, regions, venues, etc.).

id.description: Stable identifier for the location, if any.

name.description: Preferred surface name of the location.

country_code.description: Optional ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code, where applicable.

features.description: Arbitrary feature map for location attributes.

extra.description: Opaque metadata for original source representation, IDs, etc.

start_year.description: Start year of the interval, if known.

end_year.description: End year of the interval, if known.

start_day.description: Start day of month (1–31), if known.

end_day.description: End day of month (1–31), if known.

approximate.description: True if the dates are approximate or inferred.

extra.description: Opaque metadata for original time expressions or source-specific details.
